title: Michael Bloomberg announces a new initiative to phase out coal in 25 countries.
description: The goal is to see coal plants retired in many developing countries by 2040, with some wealthier countries ending coal use by 2030.
dc:creator: Lisa Friedman
category: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change
media:description: A coal-fired power plant in Mpumalanga Province, South Africa, in 2019.
